messages.video_end_cta_subtitle: Claim a 7-day PC Game Pass trial

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
1. To redeem your 7-day PC Game Pass trial code visit microsoft.com/redeem by April 15th 2025 11:59 PM PST  

2. Valid payment method required. Subscription continues automatically at then-current regular membership rate unless cancelled through your Microsoft Account.

**Limit: 1 per person/account.**

Subject to the Microsoft Services Agreement, Game Pass terms and system requirements at: xbox.com/subscriptionterms.  
**Available in US, CA, MX, BR, UK, FR, DE, AU, JP, TH, MY, SG** 

**This reward is not available in Korea, Argentina, China, Russia, and Turkey.**

messages.video_end_cta_subtitle: Claim a 7-day PC Game Pass trial

redemption_instructions_by_platform.0:
Congratulations on completing the quest! You have two ways to claim your reward:

**Path 1**
- Visit [playabi.com](https://www.arenabreakoutinfinite.com/act/a20240731cdk) to redeem the code.  
**Path 2**
- Launch the game and find **Reward Code Redemption** in the **Events** section.

**Rewards**
- **Redwood Stain Vector 45 Micro SMG (skin)**
- **7-Day Elite Membership Card** (including a 2x2 secure case)

**Support and Assistance**
**Arena Breakout: Infinite New Season: IGNITION** is now available to play for free.  
If you encounter any issues during the redemption process, please join our Discord server: [Arena Breakout: Infinite](https://discord.com/invite/arenabreakoutinfinite) for assistance and the latest information on future events and more rewards.
Congrats! You earned 1 day of Nitro.

1. To redeem your COD: Warzone Quest reward, visit Call of Duty’s code redemption website (callofduty.com/redeem) and log in to your account.

2. Enter your code to obtain your Calling Card and Double XP Token

1. Login to the Battle.net Desktop App  
2. Click your profile icon at the top right corner of the App.  
3. Click Redeem Code.          
4. You can also redeem at https://shop.battle.net/ by navigating to Redeem Code under Account. 
 
**Note: Codes must be redeemed on Battle.net specifically, but will appear for any platform where that user has a license.**
